title: Ping for "Warded" & " Enemy Jungler Spotted"
body:
Communicating with team members effectively in SoloQ is one hell of a job.
I believe many times you might have come across situations where your jungler is waiting in a bush that is warded by enemy laner.
And when you ping "Danger", some of them interpret it as "GTFO" or "I DONT NEED GANK". (For the fact that most people assume everybody is toxic af).
And mostly the communication is important to know where enemy jungler is so that you can know when to and when not to go all in against your enemy laner.
Now, while I do accept the fact that we can always type in chat like "Lee top", "Jungler at bot" etc etc and use "Danger" ping, let's just accept the fact that it's way too dangerous to type something like that in the chat while laning.

Also as of now, people can only use "Danger" ping when spotting an enemy jungler by a ward etc.
But problem is, in SoloQ most people ignore the "Danger" ping unless it is used near them, since everybody have this habit of spamming Danger asking your ally to fall back when in a bad position.
So, unless the Danger ping is not used sight of the person, he will not care to look if that ping shows where enemy jungler is, or if that ping ask an ally to fall back.
---
So How about we could add these two pings.
Specially the "Jungler Spotted" ping will help A LOT in SoloQ since whenever it is used, due to its unique sound, everybody will take a look at the minimap when used.
This way whole team can properly exchange the information about enemy jungler's location without taking risks like typing it in chat everytime.
---
Meanwhile, the "Warded" ping will also make it easier for Junglers to know if it is safe to gank or not.
Because, normally we get late to type in chat that the bush is warded and by the time we make it, the jungler is already in vision to enemy's ward.
Thus giving away his location to entire team.
This could be prevented if people could just ping warded in a fraction of second and therefore keep the ally jungler out of enemy's vision.
---
I hope we could have this feature implemented since I believe this will help a lot in having better communication and making better plays as a team.

http://i.imgur.com/SLWCom2.png

If the mid laner or support is roaming and you were to ping "Jungler spotted", but the jungler is visible on the other side of the map, the message may not be received well. 

I definitely agree with the "Warded" ping though.

I mentioned a Ping specifically for jungler because people can already use Missing + Warning ping to tell exactly which enemy laner is approaching towards you.
On the other hand, a ping which is exclusively used for Jungler will make all people look at minimap and can avoid confusion a lot.
Once you go to the shadow realm and experience blind pick, having a jungler is like a 90% chance, so just replace it with "dude spotted" for the other 10% of the time.

These two pings (or variants of) have been requested since Riot introduced the ping system in the first place. Why can't "caution" or "danger" (which are redundant) be replaced by either of these? It makes sense. It adds value to communication and gameplay. Why it hasn't been done yet is completely beyond me.

Normally when I play top lane if I have checked my map for a moment and the danger ping pops up I typically just mentally think "Here we go...".

I feel like the jungler spotted ping would be effective in some scenarios, but not absolutely necessary as it can already be done with the "Careful" ping or w/e it is. It would however add a bit more clarity, and if they could lay it out to drop the ping with ease I don't see why it would hurt.

The warded ping however would be amazing. Brilliant idea.

What would be nice is if it was applied to the 'V' key in a manner consistent with 'g' + hold radial menu. So a ward ping would be 'v' + hold and when you ping a particular location, an indicator appears for 30 seconds or so on the minimap.
